content: complete your starlight set with the starlight mittens crochet pattern the perfect companion to the starlight sweater and hat these mosaic crochet mittens celebrate colour texture and creativity in the most joyful way worked using the overlay mosaic crochet technique that looks beautifully detailed yet is so much easier than it appears designed in three size ranges toddler child and adult the starlight mittens are a quick satisfying make that s perfect for gifts market prep or cosy winter accessories you ll love how each round builds that striking geometric texture using just one colour per round and because you can carry your yarn neatly at the back there are no ends to weave in whether you re new to mosaic crochet or a seasoned maker these mittens are an ideal small project to learn play with colour and master this wonderfully addictive stitch technique this mosaic crochet hat pattern includes a fully written pattern and complete mosaic charts for the mittens so you can follow whichever format suits you best a great crochet project for adventurous beginners and beyond that allows the mosaic crochet detail to shine through crocheted using us single_crochet and double_crochet stitches *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product **pattern features ** sizes included toddler child adult skill level adventurous
